articles.author: Rebecca Rubin
articles.title: DGA Awards: Christopher Nolan, Greta Gerwig Among 2024 Nominees - Variety
articles.description: The Directors Guild of America announced the feature film nominees for its 2024 awards ceremony.
articles.content: “Barbenheimer” forever! Greta Gerwig and Christopher Nolan, the filmmakers behind last summer’s blockbusters “Barbie” and “Oppenheimer,” are among the best feature film director nominees at the 76th … [+2651 chars]
